name: Flappy Turbo Backpacker
description:
Flappy Turbo Backpacker is a beautiful, thrilling game where you have to guide an astronaut down a treacherous path full of challenging traps.

Avoid smoldering hot traps and collect coins to beat your friends' scores in this thrilling space adventure!

Are you ready to get the high score? Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
